title: Create Your Role!
role description: Yutori is an early-stage San Francisco AI startup building agent-first infrastructure and generative interfaces to let AI agents perform everyday web tasks. They are hiring founding-team members across research, engineering, product, operations, and GTM under a “Create Your Role” model and offer competitive pay, equity, benefits, visa sponsorship and relocation to SF.
role responsibilities: ['Design and build components of an agent-first stack (models, training, and product interfaces).', 'Contribute to building AI agents that perform and take actions on the web.', 'Define and own a self-created role across research, engineering, product, operations, or GTM.', 'Collaborate closely within a small, cross-functional founding team with design-minded product focus.', 'Communicate proactively and work iteratively to deliver high-quality results.']
role reqs: ['Demonstrated experience and expertise relevant to the role you are applying for.', 'Strong technical or domain skills aligned with research, engineering, product, operations, or GTM.', 'High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, and low ego.', 'Proactive, clear communication skills.', 'Willingness to work in-person in San Francisco (visa sponsorship and relocation stipend available).', 'Passion for building superhuman AI agents and contributing to an early-stage startup mission.']
fit reason: Strong fit for GTM/ops/product/growth roles — solid data/ML skills, startup & VC experience, high agency and cross‑functional background; modest direct experience building agent/LLM production systems lowers fit for deep engineering/research roles.

title: Growth Engineer
role description: Yutori is an early-stage AI startup building agent-first web products and infrastructure to automate everyday digital tasks. They seek a scrappy Growth Engineer to join the founding team in San Francisco to translate advanced AI capabilities into reliable product experiences and drive user growth.
role responsibilities: ['Design, implement, and analyze experiments to drive user acquisition, activation, and retention', 'Own and develop frontend and backend systems that support growth initiatives', 'Improve the speed and quality of the engineering process', 'Work closely with designers, product managers, and AI engineers to ship iterations quickly']
role reqs: ['Strong engineering skills with experience in React, TypeScript, Python, and AWS', 'Deep understanding of the web and HTTP', 'Experience with large distributed systems', 'High intellectual ability, emotional intelligence, ownership, craftsmanship, and low ego', 'Proactive and clear communicator with strong product intuition and attention to detail', 'Comfortable working in a small, fast-moving, in-person team environment']
fit reason: Strong growth/experimentation, product and Python background but lacks required frontend (React/TypeScript), AWS and distributed-systems engineering depth.

title: Create Your Role!
role description: Yutori is an early-stage AI company building agent-first systems that automate everyday web tasks. They seek versatile, highly motivated candidates to join the founding team in roles across research, engineering, product, operations, or go-to-market to help build models and generative product interfaces and deliver agent-driven web automation.
role responsibilities: ['Design and build AI agents and the stack that enables them (model training through generative product interfaces)', 'Implement features and systems that allow agents to take reliable actions on the web', 'Collaborate across research, engineering, product, operations or GTM depending on the role applied for', 'Work closely within a small, focused founding team, contributing high-impact work in-person in San Francisco']
role reqs: ['Demonstrated experience and expertise relevant to the specific role you apply for', 'Passion for building agent-first AI and automating web tasks', 'High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, and low ego', 'Proactive, clear communicator', 'Willing/able to work in-person in San Francisco (visa sponsorship and relocation stipend available)']
fit reason: Strong fit for ops/GTM/deployment/product roles — ML/data-science skills plus startup/VC and ops experience; slightly less depth for heavy production/agent-engineering roles.

title: Intern — AI
role description: Yutori is hiring an AI intern to work closely with the founding team in San Francisco to build agent-first web AI — training models, creating generative product interfaces, and developing web agents that can take actions. The small, research/product-focused startup is backed by prominent investors and seeks technically strong candidates for an in-person SF internship.
role responsibilities: ['Build a superhuman generalist web agent that can take actions on the web', 'Work on the full stack from training models to building generative product interfaces', 'Push the frontiers of post-training multimodal LLMs', 'Rapidly prototype and test hypotheses to iterate on models and agent behavior', 'Collaborate closely with the founding team in a small, high-skill environment']
role reqs: ['Strong technical ability and interest in building AI agents', 'Ability to get neural networks to behave and iterate on model behavior', 'Comfort quickly testing hypotheses via prototypes', 'High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, and low ego; proactive and clear communicator', 'Willingness/ability to work in-person in San Francisco (visa sponsorship and relocation stipend available)', 'Experience with post-training multimodal LLMs (CPT, SFT, RL, search, reward models) is a plus but not required']
fit reason: Has ML coursework, TensorFlow, and product/early-stage experience but lacks direct LLM/post‑training agent expertise and prefers business/strategy roles.
